title: When you finally find people who understand you...
body:
https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2FGgJjN8N.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

...I think we've got a good team comp here.

replies.body:
That reminds me, I recently saw a car with the license plate being "SHENBOT"

That wasn't you by any chance?  Or is yours "SHENPAI"?
You rang?
Pls notice me Shenpai~
Noticed <3
http://puu.sh/iNKWj/92c3ef8c28.jpg

I do love calling a Shen on my team "Shenpai" :3

One time he got really into it, and started saving me more so I would thank Shenpai (which I did ofc) xD

No, but I do plan to get a license plate for my bicycle that reads "SHENSAN."

I have yet to find one that does not wedge itself into the tire.

I'd put my nick on it, but it's too long...
Also I don't have a bike...
Or a licence plate...
Or a lifestyle that would encourage me to go outside unless I'm buying myself something to feed upon...

You could... hang it in your window, I suppose.

You do have a window, right?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I guess the door to your parents' basement works too.
We've no basement. I sleep on the roof.

Then hang it on the ladder? Geez.

I know, I know.
You don't have a ladder, you climb the rope instead.
Great! You can hang it on the gutter, then!
It's already taken. We dry clothes on it.
So tape it to your forehead, then. Or, if you don't have tape, steal some gum from the bench in the park.

162 shens
148 actually
no, it's actually 147

I saw 4 Yasuo calls in ranked today.

I was tempted to ban Yasuo.
https://img.memesuper.com/7bb7c053111079dd12b15e662bf902ff_pro-hacks-to-avoid-force-awakens-spoilers-darth-sidious-do-it-meme_320-400.jpeg
Just do it. {{summoner:14}}
I don't get it. I can't see the champions you picked.
Ninjas. They're just that good.
Clearly your team did not have much imagina{{champion:98}}, unless this is some sort of revolu{{champion:98}}, in which case I'd say ninjas are really the only op{{champion:98}}.
All for one Shen
I miss One For All.
https://i.makeagif.com/media/3-24-2014/wkU0vc.gif
This post needs more atten{{champion:98}} so more people can see the beauty in this
#ShenpaiPls
Did this actually happen? That's pretty insane lol.
A {{champion:98}}sational team comp
You know this actually works against you because you have more competition for Shenpai.
This happened to me with Sona just the other day. It's funny when something random like this just happens
River Shen
Where is the Blue Team. I don't see any of them
{{champion:28}} {{item:2055}}
I see nothing wrong with that. Looks like a viable team to me.
YAY all the shields.
